title: Drawing, "Sketches from the Middle East, including Suez Canal", January 1868
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite, at top:  Jan[uary] 1868; at center: Boats with Blocks of cement for Canal/  breakwater /  Suez.

Verso: Inscribed in graphite, at ?: light / Darker / silver; and again at bottom right: moon light / sky golden milky
description:
Recto:  Horizontal view containing the distant view of a steamer at sea at the top; two boats with blocks of cement for Suez Canal breakwater at center; and a part of the elevation of a house at bottom left.

Verso: Sky with a few clouds over the sea at night

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches from the Middle East, including Suez Canal", January 1868.
January 1868. Graphite on paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-72.
